TextStringDefinition.TextString: Change nudity settings.\n\nThese settings affect most of nudity/undressing functions.
Changing this setting requires restarting the game to take full effect!\n\nSave and restart for this setting to work.
Check to enable nudity skills, nudity autonomy, and nudity story progression.
Check to enable Sims using underwear and undressing to underwear.
Check for teens being able to participate in nudity interactions.
Check for gloves to be undressed with the top part of Sim outfit.
Check for shoes to be undressed with the bottom part of Sim outfit.
Check for socks to be undressed with shoes.
Check for leggings to be undressed with the bottom part of Sim outfit.
Check for Sims to undress their pants when going to pee.
Check for Sims to undress their top when breastfeeding.
Advanced settings for outfit undressing behavior of Sims.
Choose the type of how 'Undress Completely' interaction should undress Sims.
Select to use Sim native bathing outfit with auto fixing when undressing.
Select to use Sim current outfit as the base when undressing.

Check to make naked Sims dress up before going to their destination if reaching it will require dressing up.\nUncheck to avoid Sims dressing up before going to their destination no matter the circumstances.\n(When Sim is about to enter a room with others in it, they will dress up beforehand instead of risking embarrassment)

Check for Sims to allow undressing without limits when the 'Nudity Permitted In Room Sign' is in the room.\nUncheck for Sims to allow undressing when the 'Nudity Permitted In Room Sign' in the room, while the 'No Nudity Permitted On Lot Sign' is present on the lot.
Check for Sim bathing outfit to be automatically reset and fixed.\nUncheck for Sim bathing outfits to stay untouched, for technical use purposes.
Choose the type of notifications visibility.
Select to disable displaying notifications about nudity actions.
Select to only display notifications about autonomy nudity actions.
Select to display all notifications about nudity actions.
Check for nudity notifications to be displayed only about household Sims.\nUncheck for nudity notifications to be displayed about all Sims.
Nudity occurrence and autonomy related settings.
Check for playable Sims to be included in random nudity occurrences.
Check for Sims to never undress around children.

Check for Sims to first undress to underwear when performing an autonomous interaction before getting naked.\nUncheck for Sims to undress directly to nudity when performing an autonomous interaction and skip showing underwear.
Random Sims swimwear related accidents. Fully Check for Sims to experience this commonly. Half Check for Sims to experience this rarely. Uncheck for Sims to not experience this at all.

Random Sims forget their towel after showering in public. Fully Check for Sims to forget their towel commonly. Half Check for Sims to forget their towel rarely. Uncheck for Sims to never forget their towel.
Sims will get naked to sleep. Fully Check for Sims to always get naked to sleep. Half Check for Sims to sometimes get naked to sleep. Uncheck for Sims to never get naked to sleep.
Sims will get naked to workout at home. Fully Check for Sims to always get naked to workout. Half Check for Sims to sometimes get naked to workout. Uncheck for Sims to never get naked to workout.

Sims will get naked when getting into water*. Fully Check for Sims to always get naked in water. Half Check for Sims to sometimes get naked in water. Uncheck for Sims to never get naked in water. *(with the exception of gym, spa, and pool venues)
Sims will get naked for yoga. Fully Check for Sims to always get naked for yoga. Half Check for Sims to sometimes get naked for yoga. Uncheck for Sims to never get naked for yoga.
Sims will get naked for massages. Fully Check for Sims to always get naked for massages. Half Check for Sims to sometimes get naked for massages. Uncheck for Sims to never get naked for massages.

Check for Sims to dress up to correct outfit before performing activities that require outfit changing.\nUncheck for Sims to keep their partially undressed outfit when performing activities that require outfit changing.

Check for Sims to randomly (based on skill level) decide if they want to get naked for undressing interactions.


Specific undressing interactions (like changing to sleep or changing to workout) are affected by the possibility of undressing to nude.

Random Sims undressing without any context. Fully Check for Sims to undress commonly without context. Half Check for Sims to undress rarely without context. Uncheck for Sims to never undress without context.
Sims will undress at nudity club gatherings. Fully Check for Sims to undress commonly. Half Check for Sims to undress rarely. Uncheck for Sims to never undress.
Check for Sims to flash others when at a flashing club gathering.
Check for NPC Sims in the currently visiting household to randomly become undressed without any context when a player Sim is peeping through a window.
Check to make dancers dress up after every dance.\nUncheck to keep dancers undressed after a dance.
Set a number of profit share percentage for the club from the dancer earning.\n(Default: 20%)
Check to unlock the Lap Dance cheat interaction to get a lap dance at any time as an owner of the Strip Club.
Set a number of clients that will visit the club at the same time. Using the default value will result in clients following the appropriate hours schedule.\n(Default: 0, Maximum: 30)
Check to use personalized undressing rules set within the Outfit Settings for Dancers during dancing.\nUncheck to use specialized undressing rules for Dancers during dancing.

Check to allow employee dancers to automatically change their work task depending on the situation in the club.\nUncheck to disallow employee dancers from changing their work task unless manually assigned.

Check to remove irrelevant to dancing interactions from Dancing Poles, Spot Dancing Markers, and Lap Dancing Seats.\nUncheck to keep all game interactions on Dancing Poles, Spot Dancing Markers, and Lap Dancing Spots.
Check to allow for peeping into windows.
Check to allow spawning of NPC Sims that peep into windows of the currently played house.\nUncheck to disallow spawning of NPC Sims peeping into windows.
Window Peeping NPC Sims Spawn Probability
Set a unit interval value for chance of Peeping NPC Sims showing up at the active household. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.40, Minimum: 0.01)
Check to allow for Sims to get sweaty and display a sweat body overlay.
Cheats to change things that you find annoying.
Check for Sims to respect nudity privacy.
Check for Sims to react to nudity.

'This Sim Body Selector' is a selector for picking naked body parts for the selected Sim.
The body parts that are available to select depend on the Sim Gender Settings of the selected Sim.

Selected body parts in the 'This Sim Body Selector' override any parts selected in the 'All Sims Body Selector'.

Body parts to select are only available if they are placed in your 'Mods' folder and are supported by WickedWhims.

'Random Sims Body Selector' is a selector for picking naked body parts for a random sample of Sims in the world.
The body parts that are available to select depend on the Sim Gender Settings of the selected Sim and only Sims that match the same Gender Settings will be considered for this selector.
Selecting a random body part multiple times will increase the number of Sims that have this part applied.

Selected body parts in the 'Random Sim Body Selector' override any parts selected in the 'All Sims Body Selector'.

Body parts to select are only available if they are placed in your 'Mods' folder and are supported by WickedWhims.

'All Sims Body Selector' is a selector for picking naked body parts for all of the Sims in the world.
The body parts that are available to select depend on the Sim Gender Settings of the selected Sim and only Sims that match the same Gender Settings will be considered for this selector.

Body parts to select are only available if they are placed in your 'Mods' folder and are supported by WickedWhims.
Take off your clothes and discover the wonderful world of Naturism!

The thought of nudity is scarier than nudity itself.

The more you stay naked, the more confidence you gain.
Performing interactions naked lowers the amount of lost hygiene.

Start by changing into more revealing outfits (sleepwear, swimwear or underwear) or admiring your body in mirrors.

{0.SimFirstName}'s new Naturism skill will allow {M0.him}{F0.her} to perform various nudity related activities. As the skill level increases, more will be possible.\nGet into your underwear, sleepwear or swimwear outfit and try to get more comfortable around others.
{0.SimFirstName} is now much more comfortable with nudity! Getting naked outside shouldn't be a big problem anymore.

{0.SimFirstName} is now more confident around others. There is no point to keep this as a secret.

{0.SimFirstName} can now go a step further and become an exhibitionist. Not hiding anything from anybody.
(Buy the 'Exhibitionist' trait in the Sim Rewards Store)
(Benefits of Naturism will be lost after converting to Exhibitionism)
The feeling of liberation, discovery, and freedom is something that {0.SimFirstName} cannot describe.
Take off some clothes and show off your body to others!
Expose your body to others by undressing, flashing or streaking. You have nothing to hide!
{0.SimFirstName} is now much more open to nudity and can flash other Sims! Surprise others with sudden nudity!
{0.SimFirstName} now has no problems with nudity around more Sims.
{0.SimFirstName} feels complete freedom to show your body off anywhere and anytime. There are no barriers for you anymore!
Turn your naturism into exhibitionism and unlock more nudity related interactions.\n\n(At least level 3 of Naturism Skill is required to purchase this trait).
Exhibitionists expose their bodies to gain sexual satisfaction from seeing shocked faces of others.
Sims with no underwear will never be wearing underwear ever again.
The thought of nudity could be scary, but this place pushes anyone's comfort level beyond what is considered appropriate.
Sims that are experienced with Exhibitionism get a lot of joy from flashing others.
When you shed your clothes you also shed just a few of the burdens of everyday life.

How humiliating! Nothing will let {0.SimFirstName} live up the shame from those piercing eyes of other Sims after having seen {M0.him}{F0.her} urinating. Whether urgent or not, this just wasn't worth it.
What did {0.SimFirstName} just see!? Did that Sim really just urinate right here and right now? The call of nature may be strong but what they just did is disgusting!
Click on a Sim and select any flashing option from the Wicked Exhibitionism category.
Click on a mirror and select 'Admire Your Body'.
Click on your Sim and select any outfit undressing option from Wicked Naturism/Exhibitionism category.
Click on a Sim and select any social naturism/exhibitionism option from Wicked Naturism/Exhibitionism category.

Set mannequin top and bottom underwear for the chosen outfit category. Selected underwear will only be used on the picked outfit category outfit.\n\nChanging underwear for sleepwear and swimwear outfit is not available.
<font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted On Lot</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted On Lot</font> sign prevents all Sims on the lot from explicitly undressing. This sign can be placed anywhere on the lot to take effect.\n\nThe <font color='#3AAF69'>Nudity Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the effect of this sign for the room it is placed in. Making nudity allowed only in that room.
**INVISIBLE** <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted On Lot</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The Invisible <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted On Lot</font> sign prevents all Sims on the lot from explicitly undressing. This sign can be placed anywhere on the lot to take effect. It will disappear when in Live Mode.\n\nThe <font color='#3AAF69'>Nudity Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the effect of this sign for the room it is placed in. Making nudity allowed only in that room.
<font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted In Room</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted In Room</font> sign prevents all Sims in a room with this sign from explicitly undressing. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room.
**INVISIBLE** <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted In Room</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The Invisible <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted In Room</font> sign prevents all Sims in a room with this sign from explicitly undressing. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room. It will disappear when in Live Mode.

The <font color='#3AAF69'>Nudity Permitted In Room</font> sign allows all Sims in a room with this sign to explicitly undress. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room.

With the 'Nudity Permitted Autonomy Signs Influence' setting enabled, this sign allows Sims, within a room with this sign, to undress without limits.
The <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted On Lot</font> sign will be overridden by this sign for the room it is placed in. Making nudity allowed only in that room.

The Invisible <font color='#3AAF69'>Nudity Permitted In Room</font> sign allows all Sims in a room with this sign to explicitly undress. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room. It will disappear when in Live Mode.

With the 'Nudity Permitted Autonomy Signs Influence' setting enabled, this sign allows Sims, within a room with this sign, to undress without limits.
The <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted On Lot</font> sign will be overridden by this sign for the room it is placed in. Making nudity allowed only in that room.
{0.SimName} doesn't feel like taking off clothes right now is a good idea.\n\n{0.String}{1.String}{2.String}{3.String}{4.String}{5.String}{6.String}{7.String}{8.String}{9.String}
- The most comfortable place to undress will always be Sim home.\n\n
- Undressing outside requires a lot more courage.\n\n
- Sims around can make it quite embarrassing to undress.\n\n
- No nudity permitted signs on the lot or in the room prevent undressing.\n\n
- Underage Sims are present on the current lot and their eyes must be respected.\n\n
{0.SimName} doesn't feel like taking off underwear right now is a good idea.\n\n{0.String}{1.String}{2.String}{3.String}{4.String}{5.String}{6.String}{7.String}{8.String}{9.String}
{0.SimName} doesn't feel like flashing Sims right now is a good idea.\n\n{0.String}{1.String}{2.String}{3.String}{4.String}{5.String}{6.String}{7.String}{8.String}{9.String}
{0.SimName} lost {M0.his}{F0.her} swimsuit when jumping to water.
{0.SimFirstName}'s incredibly overheated body produced so much sweat that even {M0.he}{F0.she} feels disgusted. Time to take a shower and change clothes.
There are no more available job positions in your club.
{0.SimFirstName} has fired {1.SimFirstName}. {M1.He}{F1.She} will no longer show up for work.
You cannot buy a Strip Club while on vacation.
The Get to Work expansion pack is required to buy a Strip Club.

Upon confirmation, your business funds and the lot value will be deposited into your household's funds. If your business funds are in the negative, money will be deducted from the value of the lot to clear your debts. The household will earn {0.Money} from this sale.
Select the opening hour and the closing hour of your Strip Club.
The Strip Club is now open!
The Strip Club is now open!\n\nAnd it will close at {0.String}.
The Strip Club is now closed!\n\nClick on your phone to change the opening hours under the Strip Club category.

The Strip Club is now closed!
And it will open at {0.String}.

Click on your phone to change the opening hours under the Strip Club category.

The Strip Club is now open and clients will being showing up at night hours.

Any hired dancer will be arriving momentarily; be sure to assign them a task to perform or let them decide what to do on their own.

Make sure to place a Dancing Pole/Dancing Spot for Stage Dancing and Assign Lap Dancing Seats for Private Dances.

Remember to manage the bar by adjusting the Price Markup for extra profit and Order Bar Supplies to not run out of stock.
This is ridiculous! Where is the bartender? Looks like I have to find a different place to get a drink.
Your drinks are way too expensive for what you have available. I'm leaving to find a better place to get a drink.
What is this club? Why is nobody dancing? What's the point of going here? I'm leaving.
I want someone to talk to and get a private dance! Am I to believe that all of the dancers are busy right now? You need to manage this place better.
You can't do this as a Strip Club client.
{1.SimFirstName} is way too tired to dance on stage. Give {M1.him}{F1.her} a few minutes.
There are no available lap dancing spots.
All lap dancing spots are currently in use.
Influences customer satisfaction from striptease dancing.
Influences customer satisfaction from charming interactions.
Influences customer satisfaction from prepared drinks.

{0.SimFirstName} has hired a new employee. {1.SimName} will arrive for {M1.his}{F1.her} first shift the next time the club is opened.
Be sure to track {1.SimFirstName}'s skills in the Employee Management window and assign {M1.him}{F1.her} an appropriate work task when {M1.he}{F1.she} arrives.
There are no dancing spots in this club.

Looks like there are no Dancing Poles or Dancing Spots in the club. Dancers are not able to perform for the clients.\n\nPlace a Dancing Pole or a Dancing Spot somewhere in the club to allow dancers to dance.
You can't do this as a Strip Club dancer.

Sims with the Striptease skill perform the most sensual dancing moves you can imagine. They love to dance and impress the audience.\n\nDance on a Dancing Pole, a Dancing Spot, or perform a Lap Dance to increase this skill. Dancing to the Sim favorite music genre further strengthens the Striptease performance.
Select which dance type animations you want to disable.
Select which creator animations you want to disable.

Buying a Dancing Pole or a Dancing Spot Marker is required for dancers to Stage Dance and for clients to watch them.

Look for a 'Dancing Pole' or a 'Dancing Spot' in Build Mode and place one in an open area or at a stage.
Clients will gather around and look for a comfortable seat to watch dancers. It's suggested to place seats around the Dancing Pole or Dancing Spot.

Assigning Lap Dancing Seats is required for clients to ask for a private dance.
Any Loveseat, Sofa, Recliner, or Chair in the club can be assigned as a Lap Dancing Seat.
Build at least one private room, place a seat inside it, and click on it to 'Assign Lap Dancing Spot'. Any client asking for a dance will use the assigned seats to receive a lap dance.

All seats assigned as Lap Dancing Seats are exclusively used for lap dancing.

Click on any Dancer and assign the 'Charming Clients' task to allow the dancer and the clients to initiate private dances.
Wicked Strip Club Dancing Spot Marker
Wicked Strip Club Dancing Spot Marker (Invisible)

Specialized floor marking spot that is used by dancers as the designated dancing position. Dancers on this spot will perform dances that do not involve a dancing pole.\n\nPut this object in places where dancers are meant to dance when assigned the dancing role. Use the invisible variant to make the dancing spots not visible in Live Mode.

Freestanding spin dancing poles are an easy and convenient choice for blooming Strip Club businesses. The shiny finish and rotating function enhance dancers performance with additional 'wow factor' that makes customers heads turn.\nProvided by the Noir and Dark Sims Inc.
Your order for {0.Number} Bar Supplies has been placed and will arrive the next day at around noon.
Your order of Bar Supplies has been delivered to your Strip Club.

Currently you have {0.Number} out of {1.Number} supplies and ordered {2.Number} supplies.

Do you want to order {3.Number} supplies for {4.Number} Simoleons?

Purchased supplies add up to the total of ordered supplies that will be delivered the next day at around noon.
The cost of supplies depends on the base price of the drinks ordered by clients. Selling expensive drinks requires purchasing expensive supplies.
You already ordered {0.Number} out of {1.Number} supplies.
This is the current price markup.
Hey boss, we're running out of Bar Supplies. Clients are ordering drinks we can't prepare. Could you order more supplies?
Hey boss, we are out of Bar Supplies. We can't sell any more drinks until you restock the bar. Could you order more supplies?

High Price Markup and Low Bar Supplies decrease the likeliness of clients purchasing drinks.

Shortage of supplies means fewer drinks to offer, and increased price makes them less appealing for purchase. When you can't sell the client's favorite drinks, lower the 'Price Markup' to make other drinks an attractive offer.

Click on any Bar to access the Strip Club Price Markup menu.

Bar Supplies are required to prepare drinks for clients. Each prepared drink consumes supplies, and when they run out, drinks cannot be prepared anymore.

You can order supplies by clicking on any Bar to access the Strip Club 'Order Supplies' menu.
Purchased supplies add up to the total of ordered supplies that will be delivered the next day at around noon.
The cost of supplies depends on the base price of the drinks ordered by clients. Selling expensive drinks requires purchasing expensive supplies.
Things here are great! You're a fantastic boss and I couldn't be happier with our customers.
I get up each day, excited to bring joy to our customers.
Everything about my work makes me happy! And that makes our customers happy!
I wake up every day thinking about ways that I can continue to impress our customers. I love the challenge of working here!
I tell all of my {M1.male}{F1.female} friends that they should try and get hired here. It's the best job I've ever had!
This place is pretty good. I have some ideas about how to make it better that I'd really like to share with you.
This is a pretty nice place to work. It'd be better if things were a little less sticky sometimes...
I'm fairly happy here... I enjoy interacting with the customers.
The work here is rewarding. We get along well, and I feel valued. I'm satisfied with that.
How do I feel? Hmm... Well, work could be better I suppose. But on the other hand, work could definitely be worse... I guess I'm OK with things just the way they are.
Work is what work is... It's just a means to an end for me.
Things are alright. Thanks for asking.
Just let me earn my paycheck and you won't hear any complaints out of me.
Things are OK. You could always pay me more money and see if I improve.
If hating this job could get me promoted, I'd be running this place!
How am I feeling about my job? Meh!
I guess things are just fine. I come to work, get paid... Yup, that's a job alright.
I'm really just here to earn money. I put in the work, you pay me, and we'll get along just fine.
I wake up every day thinking about ways that I can continue to impress you. I wish I could get a promotion.
You're a terrible boss. I wish that you weren't, but you are. Every day.
Mumble mumble... start a fire... At least I'd get to go home for the day. Mumble...
Can't you just leave me alone? I get enough socializing with the customers.
What do you want now? You're interrupting my personal thoughts! Stay out of my head and stop wasting my time!
Oh no! Some perverted Sim was peeping through the window and {0.SimFirstName} caught them taking a picture of {M0.his}{F0.her} naked body!
{0.SimFirstName} felt an unexpected feeling of excitement after noticing a flash of someone taking a picture of {M0.his}{F0.her} naked body through the window!
{0.SimFirstName} was caught peeping through a window with {M0.his}{F0.her} pants down!
Not much has happened for the past few hours of peeping. {0.SimFirstName} might have to try again tomorrow.
Whoa! {0.SimFirstName} got really excited from watching hot exposed bodies through the window. That was totally worth the risk of getting caught.

Uh oh! {0.SimName} has been caught peeping through the window by {1.SimName}! Time to escape!

Running away might save {0.SimFirstName}'s butt from getting beat up, but {M0.his}{F0.her} reputation was severely affected with every member of {1.SimFirstName}'s household.
Better be careful next time... this could have ended a lot worse.

Uh oh! {0.SimName} has been caught peeping through the window by {1.SimName}!

{1.SimFirstName} is looking quite upset, and without any hesitation, {M1.he}{F1.she} begins approaching {0.SimFirstName} to beat {M0.him}{F0.her} up and show {M0.him}{F0.her} where {M0.his}{F0.her} place is.
Maybe if {M0.his}{F0.her} Fitness skill were better, {0.SimFirstName} would be able to avoid getting beat up in the future.

Uh oh! {1.SimName} noticed {0.SimName} taking a picture through the window! Time to escape!

Running away might just save {0.SimFirstName} from being recognized, but {M0.he}{F0.she} can't be sure that {1.SimFirstName} doesn't know who was peeping on {M1.him}{F1.her}.
Better be careful next time... this could have ended a lot worse. At least {0.SimFirstName} got a picture as a souvenir.

{0.SimFirstName} just took a picture while peeping through the window.
Pictures of naked Sims or Sims having sex are worth a bit of money and can be sold on the internet.

To sell peeping pictures, click on the Computer and select Sell Peeping Pictures under the Wicked category.
{0.SimFirstName} has sold the peeping pictures {M0.he}{F0.she} took for total of {1.Number} Simoleons.\n
